without quotes file: (./fixtures/replace1.txt)
// BUILD_INCLUDE(./fixtures/replace1.txt)

with single quotes file: ('./fixtures/replace1.txt')
// BUILD_INCLUDE('./fixtures/replace1.txt')

with double quotes file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
// BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")

with extra space file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
//     BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")

with no space file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
//BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")

with html comments, no quotes, no space file: (./fixtures/replace1.txt)
<!--BUILD_INCLUDE(./fixtures/replace1.txt)-->

with html comments, quotes, space file: ( './fixtures/replace1.txt' )
<!--   BUILD_INCLUDE( './fixtures/replace1.txt' ) -->

In a sentence, file: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
This part is permanent. THIS IS NOT: //BUILD_INCLUDE("./fixtures/replace1.txt")

Lower case build_include, flie: ("./fixtures/replace1.txt")
// build_include("./fixtures/replace1.txt")

Mixed case build_include file: (  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  )
// Build_Include(  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  )

with space on both sides of quote, file: (  "  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  "   )
//BUILD_INCLUDE(  "  ./fixtures/replace1.txt  "   )

with file that spaces in the name, file: ( "./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt" )
// BUILD_INCLUDE( "./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt" )

with file that spaces in the name not using quotes, file: ( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt )
// BUILD_INCLUDE( ./fixtures/replacement file 01.txt )
